header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Music, a party, Alice in Wonderland, a photoshoot and family photos, eating, swearing, the aerial hoop, a muddy obstacle course
header.activity: Family talking about music, a party and photos

do you mean my favourite individual artist? or type of music? or song?
type of music song and artist
oh mm now I'm a kind of song girl rather than a particular l particular band so I I don't mind who's written what so long as it's good
so I do like classical music and I like singing classical music like Mozart and Handel and things like that and I like jazz but I really like clubbing music
music that you go nightclubbing so the kind of music we listen to in the car
cool like talk to me baby
the child friendly one and erm I'm really hoping that has got a DJ this evening so I can have a bit of a boogie
well that's what old people say a proper dance

but erm I do know a particular song I really like
mm? you can never remember what it's called though
by Z someone Larsson Zara Larsson I can't remember that's a lovely song

so I would've put my Alice in Wonderland dress on and taken you on an adventure that'd be good

don't know well it's quite creepy I suppose it was written a long time ago

the story is of a little girl called Alice who falls asleep and dreams she goes down a rabbit hole and has an adventure where she eats something and shrinks and drinks something and goes really big

yeah just for sort of no reason at all
well that's what kings and queens do
is that why everyone's scared of her?
mm but you wouldn't be like that if you were a queen would you?

it's sad you're gonna have to delete some

and I've got about thirty from that

and that'll probably be going down a little bit so I'm trying to get it so it's about four photographs for each different style or scene that we did but yeah so it's still that's still a load of photographs that's still a lot where do you think? it's almost as big as your head

cos we can always go scooting anyway afterwards
so good? what do you think you're gonna do at circus tomorrow?

like c head to head to toe in mud

that's how muddy it will be

erm it is still just fun but you are timed so you know how fast or slow you are whereas the other one that I'm gonna do in the summer Insane Terrain I'm not getting timed for that so it's called the Spartan sprint I will not be sprinting because it's five kilometres and I can't sprint anyway but erm

and and other things that I don't know about probably crawl under some barbed wire that sort of thing
